review: This is a great addition for me.  I watch Netflix, and not a whole lot of modern television.  I don't think I would have this on it's own, but as an added form of entertainment.  The prices of the movies are very high, and even rentals are high compared to Hulu and Vudu.  I also wish that the selection of "classic" movies (Carey Grant, Lauren Bacall, etc.) was more extensive.  It's very limited right now, but I'm sure there are coyright and other issues to contend with.  The interface is very easy to use, and the speed is excellent.  I'm also enjoying some of the original programming Amazon offers.  All in all, a worthy tool.
